channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT7603, MT7610, MT7612, MT7613, MT7615, MT7620, MT7622, MT7628, MT7629, MT7915, MT7916, MT7986, MT8981
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT7603, MT7610, MT7612, MT7613, MT7615, MT7620, MT7622, MT7628, MT7629, MT7915, MT7916, MT7986, MT8981

item.title: CVE-2022-26441|2024-08-03T05:03:32.837Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt7603%2C%20mt7610%2C%20mt7612%2C%20mt7613%2C%20mt7615%2C%20mt7620%2C%20mt7622%2C%20mt7628%2C%20mt7629%2C%20mt7915%2C%20mt7916%2C%20mt7986%2C%20mt8981
item.description: In wifi driver, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: GN20220420044; Issue ID: GN20220420044.
